cells.source:
# Welcome to JupyterLite on Galaxy

This notebook runs entirely in your browser using WebAssembly-powered Python (via Pyodide), seamlessly integrated with your Galaxy history.

You can `import gxy` and:

- Open and edit notebooks linked to Galaxy datasets
- Download data using e.g. `filename = await gxy.get(1)`
- Upload results using e.g. `await gxy.put(filename)`
- Make API requests using e.g. `await gxy.api("/api/version")`

No setup, no dependencies â€” just Python in the browser with full access to your Galaxy environment.
